segments.text: Hi , sir . Could you tell me where the Hilton Hotel is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are two Hilton Hotels around here . Which one is your destination ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Eh , let me see . Sorry , I can't remember it , because I've been there only once , accompanied by my friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , it would be a little bit harder to find out your way . Do you remember the name of the street , or one or two landmarks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A bookstore , probably . With a yellow and orange logo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I remembered there is a very busy street several miles away . I waited for the traffic light for a very long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , is there a bank near there , Standard Charted possibly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yeah , I got it , there is a bank My friend exchanged her money there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the second branch hotel of Hilton . Walk straight down and you will see the bookstore you just mentioned . Turn left , I believe , you will get it .
segments.speaker: S2
